name:H‚Äça‚Äçn‚Äç ‚ÄçL‚Äçi‚Äçn‚Äç ‚ÄçC‚Äçh‚Äça‚Äçi
info:Classic Ocean View Bed-King Bed
info:Stayed in May 2024
info:Couples
info:4 Reviews
rating:3
posted:Posted May 27, 2024
msg:First, what's good about this place. A nice scenery that you wake up with if you take the ocean facing view. Its a nice walk to the beach. Very family oriented place with amenities that are chile-centric.

A good spread of breakfast and delicious too. 

However, I was surprised to see services staff such as Reception, Bell boy and Gym staff seems to be dis-interested and not service oriented. Did not offer help with our baggage during our checked in. Receptionist ask us to bring our own luggage to the baggage storage. Not that we couldn't carry it but we were just very surprised to see this coming from a prestigious/luxury hotel. 

Some of the equipment at the gym facilities were dirty. Watermelon seeds on the bench, dead cricket on the cable machine and visible sweat stain on the bench. The gym staff seems unbothered when we came in. Note there's a sign says that gym equipment is disinfected after each use. I came early to check out the gym and only goes to the gym after my breakfast (the dirt were still there) lmaoooo.

Room is good and the bed is very comfortable. However, I would like to point out that the room is overly used. Wooden furniture were pale and there's a mouldy smell in the shower room. Balcony privacy wooden gate seems to rotten and faulty.
----------------------------------------

name:G‚Äçu‚Äçe‚Äçs‚Äçt‚Äç ‚ÄçU‚Äçs‚Äçe‚Äçr
info:Classic Sea View Bed-King Bed
info:Stayed in January 2024
info:Solo travelers
info:12 Reviews
rating:5
posted:Posted February 4, 2024
msg:I picked this resort as it seemed to be high quality and close to the beach, and both of those things were fulfilled.

The room was huge with an amazing view of the ocean and fresh fruit was surprise delivered on the first day.

All the staff was wonderful, and Marnie did an incredible job being my WeChat butler, she helped me with anything I asked, and even asked if I wanted different pillows for the bed, what amazing service!

The breakfast buffet was outstanding, both Chinese and western breakfast, much of it cooked to order.

The location is not too far from Sanya and close to Yalong Bay train station, so very convenient. Also right next to huge duty free mall with many restaurants, and more authentic food and shopping experiences a short drive away.

The pool was lovely and the aquarium was full of beautiful fish and turtles.

The beach is basically on site, past a lawn from the main building, but it is not supervised and the currents are apparently strong, so swimming is prohibited. 

I visited the nearby "super luxury" Atlantis to check out the bar there, but I'm happy I stayed at the Intercontinental since it's much quieter and much more relaxed. It's not cheap but it's one of the best hotel experiences I've ever had.
----------------------------------------

name:D‚Äça‚Äçn‚Äçi‚Äç-‚Äçl‚Äço
info:Classic Ocean View Bed-King Bed
info:Stayed in April 2024
info:Family
info:3 Reviews
rating:3.7
posted:Posted April 13, 2024
msg:Good:
- Beautiful sea-view room with a wonderful panoramic window.
- Lovely tropical gardens.
- Great swimming pool with lots of shaded areas and a transparent kayak.
- Lovely beach with loungers, sunshades and basic amenities (lemonade, towels, beach toys).
- Awesome night views.
- Amazing open-air aquarium with exotic fish and turtles.
- Great amenities for kids (electric vehicles, train, pedal karts, swimming pool floats and boats).
- Friendly and helpful staff.
- Great location near CDF mall.
- Really good breakfast.

Bad:
- I received a significant electric shock just by touching the front tray of the children‚Äôs popcorn machine at breakfast. I immediately informed a member of staff whose response made me feel this was not the first time it had happened. They switched off the popcorn machine and said somebody would fix it. 10mins later we saw the machine was switched on again (the staff member said it was fixed).
- The security chain on the door to our room locked itself from the inside after we left the room, so we could not get in when we got back. Had to wait 15-20min for staff to open the chain from the outside, then had to wait another 30-40min for a repairman to replace the old/faulty chain lock - this took a while because the new hardware did not fit properly and the door could not be closed (it was fixed with some loud hammering). The next day, the door couldn‚Äôt close again so I had to again wait for a repairman to fix it (more loud hammering).
- A few times we had no response when calling ‚Äúinstant service‚Äù on the phone. The WeChat service was also sometimes slower than we‚Äôd expected, especially for urgent questions.
- Tired and worn out exterior and interior decoration (faded/peeling paint, damp patches).
- Wobbly fixings (balcony light, toilet paper holder).
- Confusing A/C controls (two control panels, no indication what each one is for)
- Live music started quite late and was loud - we had to close balcony door to let our child sleep.
- Transparent doors to the shower and toilet cubicles.
- Inconsistent service at breakfast (some days very attentive, some days not so).
- No good value lunch or dinner options. I tried a room service salad which was terrible (it used canned beans, canned corn and canned chickpeas, and processed roast chicken) - surprisingly bad value and quality.
- One evening our taxi was not permitted to enter the hotel grounds due to a special event. We had to walk up the long driveway with our (tired) young daughter‚Ä¶.it would have been nice for the hotel to offer their electric buggy shuttle from the main road to the lobby.
- After the trip, I received an email with a link to the bill, but this link took me to a web page which said an online bill was unavailable.

name:G‚Äçu‚Äçe‚Äçs‚Äçt‚Äç ‚ÄçU‚Äçs‚Äçe‚Äçr
info:Classic Bed-King Bed
info:Stayed in May 2024

posted:Posted May 15, 2024
msg:Lucas, the butler of InterContinental Hotel Haitang Bay Tianfang, is very good! Lucas's butler service is attentive and thoughtful. On the day of check-out, the photographer who was scheduled to take us to the sea took us "down to the sea". The luggage was originally packed, but because the clothes were wet and needed to be dealt with, Lucas contacted us to help us add an extra hour on the basis of the delayed check-out time. It was very considerate. Thank you.
The hotel is a five-minute walk from the duty-free shop, which is very convenient.
I personally like the dressing table in my room very much, which I have never seen in other hotels.
The lawn is very pleasing to the eye and very beautiful for taking pictures. The LOVE-shaped wooden stakes are also very photogenic.
The mermaid is very beautiful and interacted with us, adding an unforgettable memory. Lucas also took the initiative to share the voucher to help us save a little meal money, which is also a real saving, thank you.
I have stayed in Edition, Ritz-Carlton, Sheraton, St. Regis... Tianfang is still the most suitable for taking pictures.
I received two calls from the InterContinental lady, asking if the suggestions I made were resolved, and also asked about our stay experience. The voice is very cute, and she kept talking to me with a smile.
The staff who handled the water in the bathroom was a little white and fat, very gentle and patient. Thank you.
Every staff member I met was very nice.
I spent a good three days at Tianfang InterContinental and spent a wonderful Mother's Day with my mother. I will come again. I will also recommend it to people around me.

The service for two nights and three days was very thoughtful and careful, and he also gave small gifts to the children. The room was on the 10th floor, which was a little low. The eaves of the lobby blocked the view a little, but I didn't see any construction at all. The breakfast and the executive lounge were quite delicious. The dregs vinegar and Baoluo noodles for breakfast were very special. The executive lounge also had special blends and special noodle stalls or porridge stalls. The hotel's amusement park is also suitable for children aged 2 or 3. It is also close to the beach and swimming pool. But the attitudes of the hotel waiters are indeed a bit uneven, maybe some of them are outsourced teams.

posted:Posted May 7, 2024
msg:I moved to InterContinental to extend my vacation. As a long-term business traveler, I was a gold card holder of InterContinental two years ago, but later I changed to Marriott for various reasons. As a result, I stayed at Sheraton a few days ago, but as a Marriott gold card holder, I was not given an upgrade. Instead, the late check-out that I enjoyed until 4 o'clock was only given until 3 o'clock. The key word is one word: noisy. Maybe it's because the people who stay here are all families with children. They come out to enjoy the quietness and don't want too much noise. I changed to InterContinental because I thought the service was good before. As for the experience, it was as good as before, and there was a surprise that I was upgraded to a suite. I'm used to staying in business class, and the warm details of InterContinental still improve my experience a lot. The bedding, toiletries and bath products are obviously comfortable. The housekeeper Stella's daily care is still very warm, thank you! I will stay here again next time!

The Intercontinental butler service is first-class, especially the beautiful butler Liu Xin, who has a strong sense of responsibility, is enthusiastic and attentive, and is more warm. She also gave us a gift from our hotel. We made an appointment for a small gift. The room we booked was for two people, but we actually stayed there for three people. Butler Liu Xin and the enthusiastic little beauty at the front desk gave us another afternoon tea and breakfast for free, which was very user-friendly. Afternoon Tea Ctrip ( (Executive courtesy) is also available in two portions, adding one portion will solve the problem of dinner on the same day. Since afternoon tea is until 17:30, go early and eat more. If you eat more, you won't have to eat dinner. The variety is enough for dinner. The morning is not bad, unlike what some customers said online. I personally feel that there is a wide variety and the ingredients are fresh. It is not first-class. I cannot give a bad review. There is also an outdoor terrace table where you can watch the fish swimming around. , while savoring the delicious food, it is very warm and the guests are of high quality. There is no fighting for seats or queuing when dining, because the time is very long, from 7 to 11 o'clock in the morning, so that the guests can get up at any time, and there is no need to queue at all. There are pictures for everyone Can be browsed. 2. The services of the housekeeper (Li Xin), front desk, security, bellman, and cleaning staff are all top-notch and have five-star reviews. First, the car drives to the lobby door and you don‚Äôt need to take care of your luggage. The handsome bellman helps to keep it. After checking in, they will deliver it directly to the room. , this is the beautiful housekeeper Li Xin who welcomed us with a smile and led us through the formalities. The speed was very fast, and the security management was also humane and not rigid. We didn‚Äôt want to park, so he found us a perfect location next to the lobby. parking space. The beautiful lady at the front desk is skilled in business and has an amiable attitude. The cleaning staff, environmental protection workers, and the handsome guy at the swimming pool all greet the guests when they meet, and it is a good experience. It may be the off-season. The 1.3-meter swimming pool is closed. There is only a gradually getting deeper pool on the other side. Will the handsome guy at the swimming pool patiently tell me which side is deeper? Shallow over there? conscientious. 3. Let‚Äôs talk about some experience in terms of facilities and equipment: Since it was opened 10 years ago in 2014, some walls, wooden furniture, and bathroom tiles are a bit old, but the fabric sofas and restaurant chairs are clean and it feels like they have been regularly replaced with new fabrics. very good. The bed was clean and comfortable, and I slept very well. Because we booked a double-occupancy suite, the other person could only sleep on the sofa. I brought a small air-conditioned quilt at home, but when Butler Li Xin found out, he was very enthusiastic and arranged for someone to give a new one for free. The sheets and quilt were very touching. The next day, I took the initiative to send a WeChat message to ask about my sleeping experience. 4. In terms of hygiene, management and supervision still need to be strengthened. There are some blind spots. For example, the underside of the sofa on the balcony should not be touched every time. It can be seen through the floor-to-ceiling windows that there is no light on the other floors of the balcony, hahaüòä. 5. The hotel is good for travel photography. They say they give half an hour or 40 minutes of free travel photography time. HahaüòäThe actual photography time for me was more than an hour. I felt tired and couldn‚Äôt live up to the hard work of the photographer, so I purchased a travel photography package. , keep this beautiful set of photos as a souvenir! Good day, good mood, good scenery, beautiful experience! 6. Let me talk about Tao - Undersea Restaurant, the facilities and environment and the mermaid show are very good, but the price is high and the food does not match the food. The last person is 598, but there is no live seafood steaming program, and each person is given half a lobster. , the rest are all frozen seafood, and there are not many varieties. It is not as good as the Western Shark Seafood Buffet in the aisle of my house, but the undersea and mermaid performances are more special, and the food is average. The above are true and objective evaluations and are for your reference only! This trip is mainly about high-end hotel experience and self-driving. Because I have a home and a car in Sanya, I will choose this way to travel once a year in the off-season.

You can take the free train in the park to get to the beach, or you can walk there, which is not too far. Although the hotel is not a family hotel, there are quite a lot of things to do for three-year-olds. Those who like something quieter can choose InterContinental without hesitation. The hotel is located next to the duty-free shop, only five minutes away. If you want to shop, just close your eyes! I am very grateful to the hotel ambassador Cici Xiao Wang. She called the day before our stay and thoughtfully arranged a room relatively close to the elevator based on my situation (pregnant woman with a child) and upgraded the room type. We also communicated frequently during our stay and provided very considerate services. Next time you go on vacation, it‚Äôs better to choose Kaaba InterContinental! ! !

posted:Posted February 24, 2024
msg:After many comparisons, we finally chose Tianfang InterContinental Hotel as our hotel to stay in Haitang Bay, Sanya. When I stayed in Yalong Bay before, I always felt that the hotels were generally old and the service was lagging behind. Although Lai Tianfang is an old hotel that has been open for ten years, it is well maintained and the management is very attentive. In particular, Xiao Yang, the one-on-one service ambassador, helped us solve many problems. Because it was a family trip, several rooms could not be arranged on the same floor, which was particularly inconvenient. Xiao Yang promptly communicated with the manager to help us cancel the original room type and arrange the closest room.
The design of the Tianfang InterContinental Hotel is relatively unique. The lobby is tall and spectacular. The appearance is like a big turtle (or golden toad) facing the sea and absorbing water vapor. There is a long green lawn leading to the sea, and there are different shapes of Feng Shui around it. The design should be an architectural work that has been guided by an expert. All in all, this stay was a good experience. Will definitely come again next time!

First of all, it feels very good to be on vacation. The hotel is quieter and more leisurely than many family hotels. The garden, beach and rooms are relatively open, and the sandy beach is very fine. Whether you are walking in the garden or on the beach after a meal, or lying down on the balcony, It's very comfortable and makes people relax.
In addition, the interior of the room, toiletries and bedding are of very good quality. I am used to sleeping on tempur pedic mattresses, and I am most afraid of not being able to sleep on a bed when I go out, but the bed in the Kaaba is very comfortable.
I have to mention that the hotel is a 5-minute walk from the duty-free shop. My mother goes there every day, which is very convenient and very happy. I am also very satisfied with the fact that the room can watch the sunrise and the corridor can watch the night view.
Thanks to the housekeeper Xiaocui for providing us with considerate and enthusiastic service, making us feel at home. The room service is also warm and timely, and the breakfast has a lot of choices and the quality is up to standard.
Before checking in, I was worried about the construction site next to me after reading online posts. To be honest, I can see the construction site from the room, but there seems to be no construction, so I can't hear the noise, and it doesn't have much impact on the overall landscape. Posted some photos so you can judge for yourself.
Overall, I highly recommend this hotel, especially for people like me who want a leisurely vacation. I hope it will be helpful to everyone.

name:D‚Äçr‚ÄçS‚Äçh‚Äçe‚Äçp‚Äça‚Äçr‚Äçd
info:1 King 1 Double bed JuniorSTE Ocean view
info:Stayed in February 2024
info:Family
info:7 Reviews
rating:5
posted:Posted March 7, 2024
msg:I wanted to stay at Intercontinental before the Spring Festival, but I finally checked in successfully after the holiday. Before I even took off, I received a contact from the housekeeper Xiao Su, confirming the needs of children and other guests.
The check-in experience is very good. Suite guests will be led to the suite check-in area individually, and the staff will arrange for the elderly and children to sit and wait. The room is spacious, and I especially like the bathroom area of ‚Äã‚Äãthe InterContinental. The bathroom and shower room are very spacious, and an adult with two children can easily move around in the shower room. The bathtub is outdoors, which is a matter of opinion. I prefer it. There is actually a hollow fence near the bathtub, which takes into account sunlight, sea breeze and privacy. Haitang Bay is very windy, so in winter when the weather is cold and you don‚Äôt want to go to the swimming pool, you can take a comfortable hot bath on the balcony and watch the sea.
The children's playground is spacious and can be played by children of all sizes. I have never been to Yanlord. Among the St. Regis, Sheraton, Grand Hyatt, and Taikang Homes I have stayed in, it is the largest, and the second largest is the Grand Hyatt. Moreover, the children's parks of Intercontinental and Grand Hyatt do not have a trendy smell. A major feature of Intercontinental is that there are many free items. Except for fish feeding and snorkeling in the aquarium, other children's items are all free. The multi-person bicycles, electric cars, etc. next to it are all free. Next to the family heated swimming pool, there are also various free swimming rings, arm rings and even boats that can be borrowed. Riding on the small train is also free, and the staff will actively ask guests going to and from the beach hotel if they want to take a ride.
The executive lounge has a very good view. To be honest, I really like the view from the 17th floor. The waiters are also very nice. The elderly want to eat at the executive lounge, and the children want to eat other meals. The hotel's own restaurant can order it in advance and have it delivered to everyone. On the day of the Lantern Festival, we didn't have time to receive the gifts when we participated in the activities, so Xiao Su personally delivered them to the room that day.
The Undersea Restaurant is said to be the most cost-effective in Sanya. The buffet food is nothing special, but the snacks are more exquisite. But watching the mermaids while eating is really wonderful. It is still worth bringing your children to eat there. Be sure to reserve a seat in advance.
According to online reviews, Intercontinental is not very stable. The main reason is that the rooms face the construction site, so the experience varies greatly. If the budget allows, you can consider booking a sea view suite, which basically guarantees the view, but there is a small corner. When I saw the construction site, I personally felt it had little impact.

msg:For a family trip, I chose Kaaba Intercontinental with the attitude of giving it a try. It turns out that this is a seriously underestimated family hotel. This was the first good impression I had. Everything the child needs has been prepared in the room, including a stool for the child to wash his hands and step on, a stool for him to step on when he goes to the bathroom, a baby bathtub, a little yellow duck for bathing and playing, and a bath sponge. There are many activities for children to participate in, among which tree climbing is the most challenging one. Breakfast is one of the things I'm not very satisfied with this time. First of all, when I arranged the location, I felt it was very confusing. In addition, there are not many types of breakfast, but the taste is average. The bread and desserts are not delicious and there are few types. The midpoint is the steamed buns. It's all skin and almost no filling. There are no olives on the salad bar (pickles are placed in the place of olives), and there is no skim milk in the milk. By the way, I have a small suggestion. The capsule coffee machine in the room does not come with a small coffee cup. There is no way to remove the base under the coffee machine. I can only use the large coffee cup to hold the coffee with my hand. Overall, I am quite satisfied with everything. The best thing is that the service from check-in to room service is fast and responsive, with a warm attitude and a warm feeling. Next time I come to Haitang Bay, I will choose Tianfang InterContinental!

We were impressed by Xiaoxuan's attentiveness and professionalism. She even considered that we and the elderly lived on the same floor so that we could take care of each other, and upgraded us to a room that was closer to us. As soon as we stepped into the room, we were attracted by the excellent room type and the magnificent sea view. It's like being in a beautiful picture, facing the sea, with spring flowers blooming. This is exactly the family vacation life we ‚Äã‚Äãyearn for.

In the next two days, we made a reservation for afternoon tea at an underwater restaurant, allowing the children to get up close to marine life and feel the charm of nature. The taste of afternoon tea is also quite good, adding a sweetness to our leisure time. In addition, we also booked a fish feeding activity. The price of 58 yuan is very affordable, which makes people feel that it is a great value for money. Sitting on the boat, we saw many turtles and small fish, as if we were in a magical underwater world.

Manager Wang Haiou of the Chinese restaurant also gave us meticulous care and service, making us feel the warmth of home during the meal. There is also Liu Chunxi in the children's area. He leads the children to catch crabs on the beach at night, making it fun for both adults and children. We also booked the photography service provided by the hotel and carefully selected some memorable photos to leave beautiful memories.

The most noteworthy thing is that the large lawn design of the InterContinental Hotel, which leads directly to the seaside, is so beautiful and convenient. Here, we enjoy the sunshine, sea breeze and green grass, and feel the gifts of nature.

All in all, everything about the InterContinental Hotel made us feel great! Not only does it have excellent parent-child activities, comfortable accommodation, delicious dining options and a professional service team, it also has an invisible power that brings family members closer together. Here we have gained wonderful memories and precious family time.

msg:Serve:
I have to give a thumbs up to Kaaba‚Äôs service. After checking in, Stella, the housekeeper, saw that the child was feeling uncomfortable due to motion sickness and vomiting, so she brought the child a bowl of porridge, which was full of details.
At the same time, Stalla patiently helped us introduce the hotel's facilities and activities. Because the set meal I bought included coconut chicken hotpot and fish feeding on the shore, Stella reminded me to save the screenshot for easy retrieval, like üëçüèª
	
The children took a lunch break to regain their strength and participated in the hotel‚Äôs coconut tree climbing activity at 4:30. Although they only dared to climb to the first gift point, they had already surpassed themselves.
I went for a walk on the beach. The wind in Haitang Bay was really not that strong, but the sand was really fine.
Because my child got motion sick today, it was really a very special day for me to lie down.
	
facility:
After breakfast the next day, we went to the beach to ride the waves and dig sand. The hotel provided sand digging tools, towels, and water on the beach. The lunch set included ü••coconut chicken hot pot. Brother Da Cheng and I both liked it, it was delicious. My dad doesn‚Äôt like coconuts, hahaha, otherwise there won‚Äôt be enough food.
Went to the family swimming pool for a swim at around 2 o'clocküèäüèª‚ôÇÔ∏è. The wind was a little bit cold, but the water temperature was very suitable, and the towels were warm and easy to use, which was very considerate.
Later, I participated in the activity of traveling around the seabed‚ûïpainting, and took a group photo with the painting. Big Cheng was very happy.
Family activities:
The parent-child activities are very attractive. We only participated in climbing coconut trees and undersea painting. Other activities such as making waffles and sandwiches were also very interesting. Stella also reminded us that there are several places that need to be reserved in advance. If you have any questions these days, if you send Stella a WeChat message, she will get a reply in seconds. The service is perfect.
Special thanks to Stella for taking care of us these days and helping us apply for a late check-out at 2 o'clock, which made our return trip less stressful. Will come again next year

name:l‚Äçc‚Äçh‚Äç2‚Äç9‚Äç0‚Äç0
info:Classic Sea View Bed-King Bed
info:Stayed in October 2023
info:Family
info:3 Reviews

posted:Posted October 15, 2023
msg:In the early days of Sanya, I stayed at Mangrove Hotel and Hilton. In recent years, I stayed at Ritz-Carlton, Atlantis, Tianfang Intercontinental, and Coral Bay Oriental Mandarin. The Kaaba Intercontinental in this trip is quite satisfactory, with outstanding overall strength. Suitable for people with babies, who like to relax while watching the sea, and visit duty-free shops
Before traveling, the hotel would call me to ask about any special requests. On the day of check-in, one of them would do the formalities, and the other would be responsible for introducing the hotel facilities and maps. This way I was quite satisfied and I didn‚Äôt feel like I was wasting time waiting at the counter. After checking in, this person would give me a call. Bella, the hotel staff member I introduced, was assigned as my housekeeper this time. Perfect service from Bella.
Since I had to sleep with my breastfed baby, I made several special bed adjus**ents during this period, and Bella responded really quickly! And I was satisfied without any trouble! In the end, I removed the crib and put together an extra bed and bed rails next to the big bed. This was amazing. With the big bed room type 1109 on the 11th floor facing the sea, my husband and I would wake up naturally a few minutes before sunrise every morning. Refreshed and slept quite comfortably. We also watched the sunrise once! Continue to catch up on sleep. When I sleep, I leave the balcony door slightly open so I can fall asleep listening to the waves. I haven't encountered any mosquito bites here. Its air-conditioning outlet is naturally blocked by two mirrors, chandeliers, and bed backrests. This is really a good design to ensure the quality of sleep! There are trash cans at every foot where you can easily throw your rubbish. The aisle door opens automatically. Next to the luggage rack is a large table, which is very convenient for spreading things. These details are the highlight of Intercontinental.
Pictures 1 and 2 are of the corridor at the back of the room, pictures 4 and 5 are of the window, and the video is of the inside of the room. It all feels very open. Although there is a construction site, it does not affect the scenery. I also like the open-air balcony bathtub, where my husband and the baby with a baby lifebuoy can watch the sea and play in the water. Someone complained about the exposure before, but it was actually okay. It actually designed a fence and sliding door, but the person who complained didn't find the details.
This hotel feels comfortable and spacious. You can walk on the large lawn to the beach, push a stroller or take a small train there. Here comes another highlight. There are people taking photos at the beach. They are not provided by the hotel as travel photos, but it is really convenient. I met the guy with a round face and a very nice attitude. He took a photo and showed it to you. He said it was 20 pictures. If you need it, just look at the money given to you and direct it to you on the spot. For example, I thought I would pick three and gave the money to three, but he directed all the money to me. It saves time and is no burden. And it is true that the colors he takes are better than those taken with a mobile phone.
When I ate at the submarine restaurant, it was all hard dishes. The chicken soup was the first time in all the buffet restaurants that I tasted the same quality as the chicken soup at home. The Chinese restaurant set meal was upgraded with grouper. On the last day, I ate the coconut chicken hotpot that was complimentary when booking a room, which was also good.
The hotel is only five minutes away from the Haitang Bay Duty Free Shop. If you have a baby, you can ask the hotel car to take it to the hotel entrance, and then push the baby stroller there, which is very close and convenient.
I took a look at the swimming pool and didn‚Äôt feel like it, so I didn‚Äôt swim. My next stop was the Mandarin Oriental at Coral Bay. It‚Äôs a different style with outstanding views. The Mandarin has a good swimming pool and self-service at the beach. But the sleep is really not as comfortable as the Intercontinental. There is a feeling of drawing energy.

The room is very large, especially the dressing room connected to the desk, which is very convenient to use. There is also a dressing table in the key room, which is great! The bathtub in the room is on the balcony, which does have privacy issues. It doesn't matter if children use it.
    This time, Intercontinental's housekeeper Xiao Yang added me on WeChat early before check-in to understand our needs. The hotel package I ordered included an airport pick-up (drop-off), and she also arranged it in advance. I would like to mention the airport drop-off service here. The intercontinental car service is very good and very convenient. The hotel is right next to the duty-free shop, just a few minutes walk.
    The hotel room is far away from the beach, and there is also a courtesy car to pick up and drop off. Water and towels are also provided for hotel guests on the beach.
    This time I also experienced taking a small boat in the hotel to feed fish and turtles, which was quite interesting. It was the first time to see sea turtles so close up.

The beach sand is very fine, the beach is flat and open, and there are many small sand crabs. I will stay here again when I come to Sanya in the future~

name:G‚Äçu‚Äçe‚Äçs‚Äçt‚Äç ‚ÄçU‚Äçs‚Äçe‚Äçr

posted:Posted July 14, 2023
msg:This time, the family stayed at the Intercontinental for 4 nights. To sum up:
1. Harry, the hotel housekeeper, is very enthusiastic and can help solve any reasonable needs.
2. The staff in the children's world of the hotel are very dedicated. There are free activities suitable for children to play from 9:20 to 7:00 every day. (You can see the children's playground project arrangement in the second picture I posted Table) The focus is free, with quantity and quality. The children especially like to take the small train of the hotel to climb the coconut tree under the coconut tree. Every participating child has a prize. It can be seen that the hotel alone It is also a matter of heart, parents who bring their children to Sanya for fun can really choose InterContinental instead of stepping on the thunder.
3. The hotel room is spacious and big enough to live comfortably. The bathroom is also good. There is also a separate bathtub outside the balcony, which is perfect for soaking in the sea view. The minibar drinks in the room are free to drink, and will be added once a day without charge. There is no service fee for the hotel's meal service. It tastes good and is suitable for those who don't want to go out for food after playing in the water.
4. There is an underwater restaurant in the hotel that is self-service. Children under 1.4 meters are free, and the food is pretty good. You can see little turtles and mermaid shows.
5. The hotel's beach is very good, with fine sand.
6. The hotel is only a few hundred meters away from the duty-free area. It is suitable for shopping at 7 or 8 o'clock in the evening. There is no need to queue up. For shopaholics, going back and forth several times a day will not delay the time of the hotel.
7. You can order takeaway, or you can go to the Duty Free Zone Phase 2 for food, which is very close, such as Burger King, and the price of Taier sauerkraut fish is the same as other places, and the portions are also sufficient.
In the past few times, I have stayed at the Park Hyatt Hotel in Sunny Bay, the Ritz-Carlton in Yalong Bay, Sheraton, Sofitel in Haitang Bay, and Sheraton. I haven't stayed in other hotels, so it's hard to post. As far as the above is concerned, the convenience of children playing, adults shopping, and eating out and shopping is the first choice for InterContinental.

name:W‚ÄçA‚ÄçY‚ÄçN‚ÄçE‚ÄçB‚ÄçA‚ÄçB‚ÄçE
info:1 King 2 Twin Beds 2 Bdrm STE Ocean View
info:Stayed in July 2023
info:Family
info:5 Reviews
rating:5
posted:Posted July 16, 2023
msg:Having stayed in many high-end hotels, I did a lot of homework before coming to Sanya this time. After all, there are too many hotels to choose from. After comparing factors such as price, room size, supporting facilities, and geographical location, I finally chose InterContinental. Sure enough, the hotel is worthy of my more than a month's efforts.
Let‚Äôs talk about transportation and location first: InterContinental is right next door to the Duty Free City, 5 minutes‚Äô walk to Phase 1 for shopping, and 15 minutes‚Äô walk to the opposite Phase 2 for dinner (Phase 2 is mainly for eating, while Phase 1 is for shopping), and it‚Äôs right there in Phase 1 Just cross a flyover. It is the hotel closest to Duty Free City. In terms of supporting facilities, it should be the most complete, so there is basically no business in the InterContinental Hotel, so the whole hotel is much quieter and suitable for vacation.
Service: This must be mentioned. From the day before we checked in to the moment we left the hotel, the enthusiasm and thoughtfulness of the waiters can be felt everywhere. The housekeeper Shirley is responsible for tracking the whole process, meeting all our requirements, and if there are any questions and things that need to be resolved, just a WeChat message and reply immediately. We booked a suite, and the package gave us an executive trea**ent. This courtesy is a real courtesy. As long as you are in the hotel, you can enjoy it in all aspects. The whole check-in experience has improved to more than one level: when you check in, go to the VIP area to check in (it was already a non-busy time when we arrived at the hotel, and no one checked in. The sisters at the front desk didn't tell us that there was a VIP area to handle it for us, but we didn't know it. After seeing the room we booked and the courtesy, they immediately apologized and took us to the VIP area to help us handle it. Through this It can be seen from the details that their daily training on VIP service has gone to the core). One day includes breakfast (you can choose to go to the ordinary cafeteria on the B1 floor or the VIP restaurant on the 17th floor. The difference is that there are many people on B1, but there are relatively many varieties. There are not many people on the 17th floor. You can eat while looking at the sea, but the variety is relatively large. Not much. Personally, I think it‚Äôs actually quite a lot. You have everything you need, and you can drink as many drinks as you like), afternoon tea starting at 3 pm (VIP restaurant on the 17th floor) and light meals starting at 6 pm (this light meal is considered a simple The ceiling of the meal, although there is no meat, but staple food such as porridge, noodles, rice and cakes are all available, and there are many good wines to drink casually). So we basically didn't go out to eat. The first is that we are afraid of being cheated, and the second is that the hotel is fully satisfied. In addition, it includes room decoration, welcome fruit, daily replenishment of drinks (seven types), snacks (Snickers bars) and gifts (little turtles). The small gifts (travel suits), towels weaved into small animals and other details from the courtesies show that the service is really good.
Hotel facilities: InterContinental fully interprets what a parent-child hotel is, adding all elements that can satisfy guests and make them happy (especially children). Let me talk about those who are interested in children first: there is a children's club in the hotel (it is very large, and there are many different types of activities for children to play every day), a small train (free of charge, as long as you ask for it, basically can meet it, we propose to go around Walk around the central lawn twice, come right away), children's electric cars (outside the children's club on the B1 floor, free), trampoline, slides, game consoles, fish feeding by boat (feeding sharks and manta rays in the large central fish tank , turtles, 58/person) and a pool for playing bubbles (starting at 5:30 p.m. every day); adults can play snorkeling and deep diving (for a fee, in the diving club on the B1 floor, personal feeling is better than diving in Boundary Island) More, of course! Just in a big fish tank), three-person bicycle, archery fitness, adult pool, family pool (I thought at first that with the adult pool, the family pool should be shallow, but in fact there are many places that are very deep , only part of the shallow water provides a lot of fun, and there are lifesaving arms, etc.), table tennis (free), billiards (free), tennis (charged). Of course, not counting the very beautiful beach, the sand is very fine and slippery, it is very good to watch the sunrise, and it is also a good choice to come here in the evening to enjoy the sea breeze. In terms of food, the hotel has a Chinese restaurant, a cafeteria, a VIP restaurant on the 17th floor, and the most famous underwater restaurant on the B2 floor. Of course, the price is not cheap.
Design: The design of the hotel is also very good. The lobby is open, and it feels very cool without air conditioning. Going to the back is a big fish tank with many deep-water fish (diving fish feeding and other items are here), and then there is a super big fish tank. The lawn (the hotel also thoughtfully set up two football goals), on both sides of the lawn is the villa area, if you pay attention carefully, you can see squirrels on the trees. The lawn leads down to the beach. That is to say, the beach can directly enter the hotel, and although the beach is open, but there are very few people, it is a pity that you cannot go into the water.
Room: Come to the room that everyone cares about most. The hotel has a total of 17 floors, but it seems that there are no 13-14 floors. In fact, it should be 15 floors. The corridor on each floor faces the northwest (that is, the second phase of Duty Free City), where you can watch the sunset. The room is facing east and south, as long as it is high enough, you can basically see the sea. The biggest advantage of InterContinental is that it has the largest room area under the same price. The price-performance ratio is super high, which is one of the reasons why I choose InterContinental. This time I chose a connecting suite (actually a sea view room + a suite), 208 square meters, big enough and comfortable. And there is a bathtub on the balcony. Watching the sea soak your feet can clear away the fatigue of the day.
       It took me an hour to write this review, which is already the limit for someone like me who doesn't usually like to write reviews. The main reason is that the whole family was very happy and satisfied with staying here during this trip (the hotel that went to Haihua Island later had a huge gap). I hope that I can help more friends who have a hard time choosing a hotel when traveling to Sanya. If I have the chance, I hope to come again.

name:G‚Äçu‚Äçe‚Äçs‚Äçt‚Äç ‚ÄçU‚Äçs‚Äçe‚Äçr
info:Classic Sea View High Floor-Twin Bed
info:Stayed in August 2023
info:Family
info:1 Review
rating:2.7
posted:Posted August 12, 2023
msg:I never bother to comment, but this time I have to write down some real feelings to prevent those who are misled by the good reviews.
I took the elderly and children on vacation, a total of 4 people, a total of 5 nights, 2 nights at the MGM, and 3 nights at the Kaaba Intercontinental. I originally planned to stay at the MGM, but was frightened by some people who commented that the MGM was old. , I saw that the Kaaba Intercontinental had a very high rating, so I chose to stay at the Kaaba Intercontinental again. The average price per person for 4 people was almost the same on both sides, but the result was disappointing and the gap was huge.
1. There are two shortcomings of the Tianfang Intercontinental. First, the area facing the sea of ‚Äã‚Äãthe hotel is not wide, and it has a narrow and deep layout. It seems that the hotel has a long way to go to the beach, so the sea view is difficult to see from any room upstairs. Reluctantly, even the best sea view room I booked is the same. On the left is a wasteland to be developed, and on the right is the Duty Free City Phase 2 construction site. Standing in the room and looking at the sea view, I really want to narrow my horizons. Compared with the MGM Supreme Sea View Suite It‚Äôs simply incomparable, you can see the difference in the video
2. The second flaw is the Kaaba Intercontinental lobby. Various bars, corridors, elevators, and room passages are fully open design. This design is in Sanya, especially in summer. It is really hot. The west-facing room passage is really hot. The death corridor is long and sunny, but it is the only way back to the room. The breakfast room is also hot except under the air-conditioning vents. This hotel is really hot everywhere except the room.
3. There is a problem with the management of the breakfast queue. Queuing is normal. It is understandable that one person queues for a family of three or four people. When I arrived around 10:10 and waited in line for about 20 minutes, a woman with a Beijing accent in front of me, Not only did I queue for my family of 4, but I also queued for her two other friends, a total of 11 people, when they were about to enter. The waiter didn't care. When I was sweating in the queue and watched others swaggering in, I regret coming here again, and not only this group of people, but also a father and son who queued up behind me were brought in by friends inside after waiting in line for a while. Why do people queue up for this kind of management?
4. There aren‚Äôt that many parent-child entertainment options at Kaaba Intercontinental. The location of the hotel is a bit awkward. I feel like there‚Äôs not much to do if you‚Äôre a couple, or if you‚Äôre bringing children or the elderly, it‚Äôs quite boring. Plus, it‚Äôs hot everywhere. So much so that my children didn't want to participate in any of the hotel's arrangements for the three days except playing in the room and visiting scenic spots outside. They were only interested in climbing coconut trees, but they didn't do it every day. They didn't go to the beach at all because it looked like they had to walk a long way. On the first day my child checked in, he cried and said he wanted to go back to MGM, so I wanted to take a family to experience it and thought it would be better to go to InterContinental. In fact, the result was really a slap in the face.
5. In terms of service, I would like to say that both companies have their own problems. There are indeed many people at MGM, and the check-in process takes a long time. There are not many people at the Intercontinental, and the check-in process does not take long, but no one will care about you after the check-in process. Let me tell you which way to get to the guest room elevator. I carried two heavy bags into the lobby at night, and the waiter at the door pretended not to see it. So many comments said that the service was good, but I really didn't feel much about it.
The good thing is that the bedding is quite comfortable, and both beds are quite comfortable. Maybe the only advantage of InterContinental is that it is close to the duty-free shop. The regular breakfast may be slightly better in InterContinental, but I got executive trea**ent at MGM, so it's okay. There is a semi-buffet ordering breakfast at the executive restaurant by the beach. The food there is very good.
Generally speaking, Intercontinental feels empty, deserted and hot. MGM has different places to play during the day and night. Parent-child and beach activities are more abundant and mature. The old situation is actually good enough to be ignored. InterContinental is in This aspect is also a bit old and has no advantages.
Comparing these two, family vacation is better to go to the beauty pageant.

name:G‚Äçu‚Äçe‚Äçs‚Äçt‚Äç ‚ÄçU‚Äçs‚Äçe‚Äçr
info:Classic Sea View Bed-King Bed
info:Stayed in July 2023
info:Family
info:2 Reviews
rating:4.7
posted:Posted July 23, 2023
msg:This is the last stop of this family outing, two rooms for two nights
Environment: The hotel is large overall, with an elegant environment, and the landscaping is also well done. It is very close to the duty-free shop, and it takes 10 minutes to walk there. To go to the nearest beach, you can take the small train in the store. The sand is very fine, but it's a pity that you can't swim in Haitang Bay. The environment of the breakfast room and Chinese restaurant is also very good. Breakfast dishes are also delicious.
Hygiene: The sanitation is very good, the linen bathtubs are relatively clean and comfortable, and the room is cleaned in a timely manner. The dining environment is very good. The public swimming pool and the slides in the children's area are a bit dirty. Maybe it rains a lot in those days and the cleaning is not timely enough.
Facilities: The room is very good, with a large area, a large balcony and a bathtub, and the wet and dry separation is also very good. The light in the room is slightly dark, which is acceptable. The small bar in the room is very thoughtful. The baby also likes the drinks and snacks. The room has everything that should be there.

Service: The most important service, butler stella and the hotel reservation depar**ent, have been contacted in advance before check-in to facilitate travel. The service level can also be maintained after check-in, which facilitates check-in and gives us a better room. Thanks Stella~. In the Tianfu restaurant inside the hotel, the environment and dishes are also very good, and the manager Wang is also very enthusiastic. Of course, there is also the underwater restaurant Tao, where the service staff are very enthusiastic. The variety of buffet is also good, relatively fresh.

But there was a small episode during the stay. The sightseeing elevator was being repaired that day, but there were no barriers or any reminders. After we swiped the card to board, the baby was trapped in the elevator for 5 minutes. There was also a sudden fall and emergency stop, and the baby was crying. It was caused by the lack of safety awareness of the hotel maintenance unit. In the end, the hotel manager on duty called to apologize..

Overall, the merits outweigh the demerits, and I still recommend everyone to stay here if everyone has a sufficient budget.

posted:Posted March 2, 2023
msg:I have stayed in many hotels, and I am usually too lazy to write reviews. This time I want to share my real stay experience. In fact, the five-star and above hotels at home and abroad are very good. This time I stayed at the Sanya Tianfang InterContinental and felt the most impressive and the most comfortable stay.
Facilities: Because it is a seaside city, no matter how high-end the hotel is, it seems that it is easy to be dirty and messy due to the influence of moisture. The entire InterContinental hotel facilities are well maintained, so there are basically no old things.

Hygiene: In terms of hygiene, we really pay attention to every corner and detail, especially the towels and bath towels, which are really white and soft, and smell good. I used to use my own towels every time I travel, but this time I used hotel towels with confidence. The daily cleaning is never perfunctory. I went into the room and touched the cabinets, and they were all clean. And although the room was disinfected, it didn't have any peculiar smell. The bed sheet quilt cover can directly wear underwear to sleep without pricking the skin.

Environment: The location of the hotel is very convenient for parking, traveling, eating, and visiting duty-free shops. During the few days of our stay, we basically solved all travel needs near the hotel. The hotel lobby is relatively transparent, and the elevator is fast, so you don't have to wait for a long time. The dining room is very comprehensive, including breakfast, lunch and dinner. The food is rich and delicious. The beach belongs to the hotel, and outsiders can't get in, so it's very clean, and it's a blockbuster if you take a photo. The sound insulation of the room is excellent, so you can sleep peacefully every night.

Service: The services of five-star hotels are relatively professional, but I think InterContinental's services are more humane. When you check in, you will arrange one-on-one service from the butler, and clearly introduce the relevant content of the hotel's visits and meals. Respond quickly, enthusiastically and thoughtfully to customer needs.
Thanks to little brother Qi Yubo for his thoughtful service. In addition to saying good morning and good night every day, he also told me to spray the mosquito repellent provided by the hotel before going to bed at night, close the doors, windows, gauze curtains, and insert mosquito repellent. Even after get off work, I still need to communicate with me on WeChat, and explain it to other colleagues seriously. My daughter is more than two years old and is prone to allergies. She was bitten by a mosquito during this trip, and her forehead was swollen with two large bumps. It is estimated that the pain affected her sleep, and she was in a bad mood when she went out to play. Mr. Qi immediately sent me a special oin**ent for mosquito bites. After applying the oin**ent, the swelling subsided within a short while, and I was instantly revived with blood on the spot. I always care about the child's condition on WeChat, and told me that if the child is not feeling well, I must tell him as soon as possible, and he will arrange a hotel doctor to see the child. The young lady who is in charge of turning down the bed and cleaning the hotel rooms is also very good. Every time, she will replenish various supplies for us with a smile. Going out with no relatives, I am most afraid of encountering all kinds of emergencies. There is a caring hotel like InterContinental, and the hotel has a warm, caring, patient and handsome little brother like Qi Yubo. My heart is really at ease. I am grateful to have you! Thank you!

msg:I am really satisfied with the Tianfang Intercontinental Hotel this time. The hotel is focusing on the "Continental" service, and I feel that it has done it. I used to prefer to go to the niche villa hotels in Perfume Bay. The service experience was not good. This time, after repeated comparisons, I chose the one next to the duty-free shop. The main reason is that the flight is relatively late and it is convenient to pass the time. I didn't expect a few surprises for me: First, the waiters will receive you with trot service, which is a scene that can only be seen in Japanese hotels. The supply of room service materials is particularly a**ospheric, and guests will not be asked to repeatedly call for water for a few bottles of water, such as water such as towels, such as tea bags and coffee. If the room staff finds that you drink a lot of tea, they will take the initiative to add mineral water water. The best thing is the dishes in the Chinese restaurant, the price is reasonable, and the main reason is that they are very delicious. We have experienced breakfast in the executive lounge and the lobby on the first floor, and it feels good. In particular, there are reminder signs on the table, which is very good, let the guests know which table is occupied and which table is empty, no need to fight for seats, and the place where the restaurant picks up cooked food does not need to be crowded and fight, and the portion is also up to you More scientific use. In Sanya in March, the weather is sometimes cold. The hotel has a heated swimming pool. The towels and mineral water by the pool are very convenient, and the children are very satisfied with the parent-child activities. The butler service arranged by the front desk has almost always helped us deal with problems in a decent and proactive manner. I especially commend the housekeeper Zhao Zibo and a little girl waiter from Guizhou in the room depar**ent. There is a special cabinet for takeaway at the entrance of the lobby, which feels more hygienic. Please remind me that there are two buses at the airport, you need to contact the front desk of the hotel, but there is basically no waiting when you leave on time. Please pay attention to this problem when you book your flight. It takes about 50 minutes to arrive at the hotel without traffic jams, and more than an hour in traffic jams. We will still choose this hotel next time.

Bed surrounds and baby toiletries can be provided. Because of the random room type booked, the two single beds are put together when there is no big bed, which is also very spacious. If you report your room number, you can take a small train to and from the beach. Children are provided with sand digging tools and swimming equipment for free, as well as multi-person bicycles and electric toy cars. The children's playground is a little simple. The service is very good. The next time I come to Sanya, I will give priority to staying again!

msg:Facilities: Parent-child activities are more abundant, but not suitable for children under three years old, üëãolder children participate;

Hygiene: Hygiene seems to be okay, but there is a peculiar smell near the toilet in the room;
In addition, it is not recommended for younger children to go to the hotel's heated swimming pool. The child is two and a half years old. After swimming in the heated swimming pool, he suddenly developed hives that night. The same situation did not occur in other indoor swimming pools before. I don't know if it is caused by the disinfectant water in the swimming pool.

Environment: Since it is the peak season before the Spring Festival, the occupancy rate is very high. The children's playground, restaurants, and swimming pools are all overcrowded. The experience is relatively not very good. It should be better in the off-season.

Service: The service is the most dissatisfied.
On the second day of check-in, the child turned on the do-not-disturb light when he took a nap in the afternoon, but the room service kept knocking on the door to wake up the child. After opening the door and telling the room staff to come back to turn down the bed and clean up at 6 pm, he returned to the room at 9 pm that night It was found that it was not cleaned, and the welcome fruit was not delivered;
I called the housekeeping depar**ent and they didn‚Äôt know much about it. A staff member came and didn‚Äôt know anything. I asked the hotel to contact the hotel directly and found that the cleaning of the hotel rooms should be outsourced rather than the hotel‚Äôs direct responsibility. After all, it belongs to a high-end hotel. This is the most basic sanitation service. However, the outsourcing system is adopted, which makes people very dissatisfied and worried about whether the hygiene standards are up to standard;
The welcome fruit marked by Ctrip when booking the hotel is a daily one, but after asking the hotel, I was told that it was only available on the day of check-in, which did not match the promotion.
After complaining about the interruption of the children's nap and the lack of daily fruit, the manager followed up, but the answer was that the room staff did not see the do not disturb light due to the strong sunlight at the time... This reason is not very acceptable to me, and finally I sent a cheesecake, a scented candle and a woven bag for the end. To be honest, the solution provided by the hotel for three or four thousand a night is not acceptable. I can only feel that the staff wants to finish the guest's complaint as soon as possible. Work.
Generally speaking, the experience is very average. As a high-end parent-child hotel, there are no reassuring sanitary conditions, and no complete supporting services. I hope that guests who plan to stay will consider it carefully.

posted:Posted January 7, 2023
msg:After letting go, I wanted to go to the beach with my family to feel the long-lost vacation a**osphere. After reading the reviews of several hotels on Ctrip, I chose Tianfang Intercontinental. It really lived up to expectations, and I can even say that I am very satisfied.
It‚Äôs winter, and the temperature in Sanya is a bit cooler. Although the waves here at Haitang Bay are too big to go into the sea, the quality of the beach is good. The hotel has a first-line sea view. From the hotel lawn to the end, there are fine sand and soft waves, blue sea and blue sky, which perfectly meets the family‚Äôs wishes. Looking forward to going to the beach for a walk every day. The beach has hotel lounge chairs and other facilities. In the afternoon, the sun is not shining, and you can stay on the shore for half a day with a book.
The hotel room is very large, the design is simple but very creative, the scenery seen from the balcony is really beautiful and indescribable, the invincible sea view is probably like this. The facilities in the room are sufficient to meet the needs, and the ventilation is very good. I especially like the design of the long table, which is very suitable for reading and writing or working with a computer. The hotel supports the service of ordering takeout, and there is a special takeout cabinet, which is easy to find. Of course, the design of the hotel's bathtub on the balcony is the only point that I don't understand, and it still feels a little awkward. As well as the lighting system of the hotel, the family complained about it and never really grasped its meaning, but since I personally don't care much about it, I won't talk about it.
The overall environment of the hotel is very good, with a seaside resort a**osphere without losing the sense of grandeur. It is especially worth the large lawn of the Amway Hotel. There is a really relaxing and soothing feeling during the walk. The villa area of the hotel has a beautiful garden design, which is spectacular and well-proportioned from a height. The swimming pool is at a constant temperature. Go swimming for a while when the weather is warm at noon, and then hold an iced young coconut and savor it slowly after landing. It is really the ultimate enjoyment.
The sanitation and service are commendable. The room is cleaned very cleanly. When you stop in the hotel occasionally, there will be service staff who will greet you warmly or ask if there is anything that can help. When arriving and leaving, they patiently helped us carry the luggage, and carefully noticed whether we needed to help store the luggage, including taking the initiative to help us save time when going through the check-out procedures, and promptly when we found that there were items suspected of being left behind in the room It can be said that it is very attentive to make inquiries on the phone.
Special thanks to Ms. Shirley, the hotel housekeeper, for being very patient. She often troubled her during the six days of staying in the hotel, but she has always answered and helped us very patiently and efficiently. Whether it was a warm introduction to the hotel's various restaurant facilities when we first arrived at the hotel, or later taking the initiative to inform us of the concert arrangements in the hotel lobby bar during the New Year's Eve, or the various help and care when we left the store, this trip has become more enjoyable. For the pleasure, I really thank her from the bottom of my heart.
There are many restaurants in the hotel. The coffee in the lobby bar is very good. Tianfu Chinese Restaurant is not as amazing as the breakfast. The breakfast variety is very rich and there are many choices. It is worth mentioning that one time when I had breakfast, I reflected the salad that my family liked to eat. It seems not every day, but the next day I was pleasantly surprised to find that this dish was available and the service staff asked if I needed help to pick up a portion. I felt that my every opinion was fully valued and I was very moved.
The hotel is very close to the Duty Free City, and sometimes I go to the second phase of the Duty Free City for dinner, and it is very convenient to go back and forth. The night wind is gusty, refreshing but not cold. You can see the night view of Duty Free City when you open the door of the hotel room and walk on the corridor. When you go back to the room and go to the balcony, you can see the swimming pool garden and the deep sea illuminated by the lights in the hotel. On New Year‚Äôs Day, you can see fireworks on both sides. Probably the most romantic New Year's Eve in the past few years.
There is a travel photography service in the hotel, but my family and I were a little socially afraid, so we didn't dare to try it. Every time I go to eat, I can pass by the children's club and the small train, but I'm too embarrassed to compete with the children for seats on the car, so I haven't tried it.
But all in all, this hotel experience is really satisfactory to me. If I have the opportunity to come to Haitang Bay in the future, I will probably still give priority to this hotel.

We are very picky about Simmons and the thickness of the quilt. During the two nights staying at the Intercontinental Hotel, we felt comfortable with the combination of the air conditioner and the eiderdown quilt and the hardness of the Simmons. The rooms in Tlantis are much better. The best experience for me is the service. I have stayed in many super five-star hotels in Sanya. InterContinental Hotel is undoubtedly the most at home. Our housekeeper, Miss Zheng Xinyue, in addition to the meticulous and warm service. , also tried to solve our needs, and took the initiative to help me with the room type upgrade and subsequent room change requirements for free. After leaving the store, I forgot the data cable. Miss Zheng Xinyue found a way, and SF Express arrived at my station. I stayed at the Atlantis Hotel for the next two days, and the service couldn't keep up with the Intercontinental. The downside is that the entire garden environment is too poorly built, which is several orders of magnitude worse than Atlantis, and even far less than the garden landscape and the seaside leisure beach of the Renaissance Resort Hotel in Shanghai Tang Bay. Also, we like swimming, this time we stayed in Intercontinental for two days and didn't swim once. The swimming pool is too small and closed. The breakfast is generally rich and good, but worse than Atlantis. In general, the warm service, the comfort in the room, and the convenience of shopping in the duty-free city are the biggest highlights of InterContinental. Oh, and the beach barbecue and beer dinner provided by the hotel is great, and the free pick-up service of Mercedes-Benz S350 is very cordial. Next time you come to Sanya, Intercontinental is the first choice.

At that time, all the dissatisfactions were told again. The employee said that he was really sorry. You speak back. Then there is no more, that is to say, this return visit call is also used for perfunctory, the key is that the same employee called me after we stayed and left the hotel the next day to ask me how my experience was, which means that he didn‚Äôt even know we were Stayed for two days. Dealing with these problems is too stereotyped, it is a form, and it can't solve anything in practice. Such Intercontinental is so disappointing

posted:Posted January 3, 2022
msg:1- Location: Go out and turn left, 5 minutes' walk to Duty Free Shop B, which is convenient for shopping (but there are pros and cons, and the road at the door is often congested accordingly)
2-Room: spacious and bright, in a relatively central position, basically facing the sea, the big bed is 2.4 meters visually, the balcony visually is 10+ square meters and equipped with recliners, which is very suitable for lying flat; although it is a hotel in 2013, it is maintained It is very good, and the decoration style is simple and Chinese, but it is not out of date; it is just that the design has many unreasonable points, such as the bathtub is on the semi-open balcony and is not connected to the shower room (with transparent glass in the middle), you have to go back to the room It takes a large circle to go to the shower room, which makes the bathtub more of a decoration; for example, the washroom and toilet are very large, but the other bedroom of the family room is small and can only fit a 1.5-meter bed, which shows that the designer designed that year In the layout of the room, how unconcerned and lazy to save trouble
3-Meals: B1 Tianjin Bay‚Äôs buffet breakfast is very rich, and there are even a variety of freshly made noodles in the north, as well as special children‚Äôs plates, children‚Äôs food and children‚Äôs meal picking locations, as well as children‚Äôs movie viewing activities and outdoor locations Next to the hotel‚Äôs ocean restaurant pool, it‚Äôs very comfortable to bask in the sun in the morning; the executive lounge is on the top 17th floor. Afternoon tea and happy hours in the evening are richer than atlantis, but the 17th floor is semi-outdoor except for the lounge area. Yes, the wind is a bit scary...
4-Kids Club: The facilities seem to be old, but it doesn‚Äôt prevent children from reluctant to go back to the room every day. There are also free train rides and outdoor trampolines in the garden, but overall it may be more suitable for preschool children
5-Beach: It seems to be a public beach in nature, not part of a hotel, the sand is very soft and fine, and there are basically no people, because the wind and waves in Haitang Bay are really scary
6-Other public areas: If I use one word to describe the Haitang Bay Intercontinental, it is "big", everywhere is empty and empty, the hotel lobby looks like a 5-story building, and the lawn is about to catch up with the football field. ... the greenery is very pleasing to the eye; the heated swimming pool is not visited, but every afternoon you can see children swimming, it must be not cold; in addition, although it is a parent-child hotel, it is not noisy, and people do not look like it. Many, probably mainly because there are not many rooms and the occupancy rate is not that big
Summary: Quiet, pleasant interior scenery, adults can be in a daze, children can also find their own fun, it is not easy to pick out faulty hotels.

name:J‚Äçi‚Äçe‚Äçs‚Äçe‚Äçn‚Äçl‚Äçi‚Äça‚Äço
info:Classic Bed
info:Stayed in December 2021
info:Business travelers
info:5 Reviews
rating:4.7
posted:Posted December 19, 2021
msg:First of all, this is an enlightenment hotel that makes me a hotel lover. The Majestic and Mandarin Oriental that I have stayed in earlier due to brand activities are not even counted. Because of it, I began to take the initiative to understand the cultural history of major hotels, as well as the spaces behind each hotel, the architects and even the chefs of the restaurants. Therefore, it is worthy of me to write an article for it to share.

I went to Sanya for the first time a few years ago, and I lived on the Intercontinental Haitang Bay. At that time, I took a taxi to the hotel and got off the bus. The transparent lobby on both sides directly sent the hot sea breeze to my face. All of a sudden, I was rescued from the dizziness of three hours by plane plus more than half an hour by car. Sober instantly. "Ah, I'm back to my favorite tropics again!" I was naturally excited. Overall, the experience was very stunning. The room was spacious and spacious. The balcony was equipped with a bathtub. The toilet and bathroom were separated from wet and dry. The bed was facing the French window, and you could see the sea not far in front of you when you lay on the bed. Breakfast was in the undersea restaurant on the second floor of the hotel. Turtles and various marine fish were swimming around outside the glass. It was indeed a good experience to watch the fish swimming overhead while having breakfast. It was a pity that it coincided with the summer vacation and there were many children, which affected the overall dining experience.

Until this year, I came to Haitang Bay InterContinental again, and the experience it gave me gave me a new understanding of InterContinental, which is of course a good side. Arrived in Sanya on December 8. As Shanghai has an epidemic-related area, I was detained at the airport for nucleic acid after getting off the plane. I waited three hours for results before letting me leave. If you miss the shuttle bus arranged by the brand, you can only take a taxi to Westin on the first day. I was really tired and hungry after the morning flight plus the absence of lunch and waiting for the nucleic acid results for more than three hours. When I arrived at Westin, I did not smile at the front desk and did not help with luggage. When I arrived in the room, there was even no welcome fruit. . Sure enough, my bad impression of Westin has never been for no reason.

Perhaps because of the extremely poor experience at Westin, the next day I moved to the intercontinental which is 700 meters away in a straight line, and my liking for it was particularly magnified. First of all, the housekeeper Daisy Wang added my WeChat account the day before I checked in, asking about my estimated check-in time and other matters. Arrived at the hotel the next day, because it was an intercontinental gold card, so I was arranged to check in at the member counter. When I placed an order with Ctrip, Ctrip gave me the right to upgrade for free, and I asked the front desk staff whether to upgrade the room type. At this time, the housekeeper Daisy came and told me that because it was a gold card, I could upgrade to two consecutive levels for free. To the Premier Ocean View Room. When you arrive in the room, although the view is not as wide as the luxurious ocean view room that I lived in for the first time, the pseudo-set pattern makes people feel at home in physical sense. It is because the room type has been upgraded. The bathroom accessories in the room I live in this time are Byredo, which I like very much, and the smell is fresh and elegant. Dyson hair dryer, the balcony is also equipped with a bathtub, and the bathroom is square and large.

üçÉEnvironment: Enthusiasm, full of green plants. In the transparent lobby on both sides, the sea breeze is blowing, and it is quite pleasant to order a refreshing meal at the outdoor lobby bar at sunset in the afternoon. In front of the lobby is a central lawn, and walking across the lawn is the beach. There are children‚Äôs pools and family pools with complete facilities for children. Here I want to talk about the beach. Since it is Haitang Bay, there is a lot of wind and waves, so you can't swim in the sea. The fly in the oin**ent is that to walk from the lawn to the beach, you need to walk on the beach barefoot, which is not as good as Capella. Capella planted a flat lawn on the beach, dividing the beach into two halves, half of the lawn, and half of the sea. It is only a few meters away from the lawn to the beach. You can also walk on the lawn when you come back with wet feet. Comfortable experience.

Other facilities are very complete. The entire hotel is spacious and spacious, and there are also tropical villas, each in a staggered layout. There are many restaurants to choose from. Because it is low season, there is basically no need to make reservations for meals, and group purchase coupons can be used, which is very favorable. In terms of price and taste, the price/performance ratio is quite high.

üîîService: Needless to say, the service is of medium to upper level in general, very friendly and enthusiastic. Very good impression, especially the service of the butler Dasiy Wang is very good. The hotel also made a very detailed tax-free shopping guide, providing coupons and shuttle bus. Airport drop-off is also available, but you need to make an appoin**ent in advance.

üöó Transportation: It is only a few hundred meters away from the duty-free city. It is very convenient. There are many foods around and there are many options for ordering. The location is excellent.

Summary: This is a high-end resort hotel with high cost performance. The service is in place, eating, drinking and having fun can be solved in the hotel. A good hotel experience can be obtained at an average price of 145, so what are the reasons for rejection? Although there is still a gap compared to the next edition or Capella, Haitang Bay Intercontinental is a good choice for people with less time and budget. It is very family-friendly, and there are a lot of children's facilities and amusement items, but because of this, it is best for singles or couples to choose to come to this intercontinental in the off-season to avoid children's noise.

The scenery of the hotel is very good, there are footballs on the lawn, goals, and archery; the swimming pool must be mentioned, 10 to 10, all day constant temperature, hot bath towels, play and then soak in the hot water pool that can be massaged Bubble, don't be too happy. There are four restaurants. The breakfast is very rich, needless to say. It is open from 7 am to 11 am. The Chinese restaurant Lucheng Crab Fried Rice is so delicious, I went to eat it twice. The beach is very quiet and the waves are big. It has been walking along the beach. It is a primitive and undeveloped place. I saw a small pier where people played hot air balloons and yachts. Different from the noisy attractions, it meets many of your needs. Of course, the most convenient thing is that the Sanya International Duty Free City is next door. It is just right to go to 8pm. There are too many people during the day and there is a long line for paying money. Finally, and most importantly, our lovely little butler, Evelyn, was very dedicated and fulfilled many of our needs and spent a wonderful holiday with us. This is the seventh time I have come to Hainan, and I will come again when I meet.
