msg:I chose this hotel mainly to learn diving and research, because I saw that the hotel has a diving center and a sea aquarium. In fact, this goal has been achieved. The hotel itself is better than previously imagined in the evaluation, but there are also some points of communication, so People are not so comfortable, write them down one by one:

1. I booked a sea view room. I received a phone call request before departure. I said it would be fine if it meets the content of the order. When I arrived at the front desk, I had a sea view room but the floor was low and there was no sea view. I asked What can I see, answer to see the platform, I am now? ? Ready to check the order to reason, and later said that I upgraded to a room with a sea view on the 12th floor. I am really... Whether it is an upgraded or an original order, this time is a proper off-season. If you can arrange it, you can arrange it properly. There is no need to say it. So ugly, right

2. Actually, the room feels good. The electric curtains are opened to see the sea view. The balcony is large and there is a bathtub. The area, furniture and soft fittings of the room are all OK. The service staff are also very polite, and the overall hygiene is also good. Yes, especially there is a note on the bedside to provide a variety of pillow choices, which is very good, which makes people feel that the unpleasantness before is unnecessary...

The hotel has a lot of green space extending all the way to the sea. The beach should be public, but there are not many people in the off-season. It feels good. It is only because of the season that you can only look at the sea, but as a guest, it‚Äôs OK, better than before. Much better

3. The diving center is outsourced and does not belong to the hotel itself, but you can use the hotel‚Äôs swimming pool and seawater aquarium. The experience is good, because it is off-season and one-to-one learning is required. The final exam will be taken once in three days. To ow's certificate, in line with expectations

4. The underwater restaurant of the hotel, the highlight is the sea water tank and the mermaid, but the price is a bit more expensive, it feels not very worthwhile

5. The hotel is very close to the duty-free shop, just a few steps away. This is a surprise. It is also recommended that the front desk explain clearly to the guests. When I check in, I told me about the shuttle bus, but I clearly remember that I saw it next to me when I came. , I think it‚Äôs very close when I overlook it from the upper floor. I thought I had made a mistake. I asked again before telling "It‚Äôs very close. Some guests think it‚Äôs very close, so they arrange a bus pick-up." This point is also...It is recommended to make it clear from the beginning. Well, because the bus has to be reserved one day in advance, it is really unnecessary

6. Finally, let me talk about Xiaofan Cici, who added me on WeChat. I want to express my gratitude for two things: First, I found out that the order included two breakfasts for children after I checked in. It was very inexplicable. The sea view double room, plus two children Where is the breakfast point? Of course, I didn‚Äôt see the content of such gibberish clearly. After communicating with Cici, I changed the normal breakfast with one person. The response was timely and the processing was very fast. Second, on the day I left, because the outing time was not arranged, Cici helped to delay the check-out. Thank you for your understanding by three o'clock in the afternoon

Above, there is a saying that the overall feeling is beyond expectations. If you can improve on the details, it will be better, and don‚Äôt ask for good comments. I originally planned to give good comments, but when I asked for it, I asked for five stars and screenshots. It was out of thin air. To add some unnecessary dislike

The photo is attached, five stars are not enough, but it is indeed a good experience, will recommend friends to live

name:G‚Äçu‚Äçe‚Äçs‚Äçt‚Äç ‚ÄçU‚Äçs‚Äçe‚Äçr
info:Upgraded Classic
info:Stayed in July 2021
info:Family
info:4 Reviews
rating:3.7
posted:Posted July 14, 2021
msg:At that time, I chose the hotel for a long time between Crown and Intercontinental. In the end, I chose InterContinental and booked two 4-night luxury rooms. What I fancy is the sea view facing the 88-square-meter guest room and the bed. First, evaluate the advantages: the Haohai room is really good, especially the big bed is facing the balcony. Every morning, the electric curtain is opened and the bed looks at the sea. But don't choose the middle room below the 7th floor, as the dome will block a large part of your view. The location of the hotel is very good, just a few minutes walk to the Duty Free City. You can go to the second stage through the overpass. There are a lot of food and it is very convenient. The hotel lobby is open, very grand and full of Southeast Asian style. The breakfast is mostly Chinese noodles. It can meet the needs of children and the elderly. There is a small fish tank next to it. There are many turtles and little devil fish. If the weather is cool, it would be nice to sit outside and eat. Below the fish tank is the underwater restaurant. The lobster set menu at Tianfu Chinese Restaurant is very good, the price is not too expensive for 4-5 people and the price of 1,000 is not too expensive, the dishes, tastes and service are very good, praise one. In addition, the hotel room service is also very good, the price is not expensive, the mobile phone order is convenient, and it can be delivered within half an hour. The greenery of the hotel is good, there is a large lawn, and the beach is just walking past, but it is too awful, and there are almost no people on the big beach. The sand is not as fine as the Yalong Bay. Haitang Bay has relatively large waves, and there are no marine projects in the hotel. Let‚Äôs talk about the shortcomings: the biggest shortcoming lies in the service. When we arrived at the hotel, there was no bellman who took the initiative to help carry the luggage. Our family waited on the sofa next to it until after we checked in. The so-called butler brought us into the guest room floor, and no one introduced us to the hotel's facilities. It was entirely our own exploration. The breakfast service was not positive enough to close empty plates. The waiter often walked past our table empty-handed but turned a blind eye to the few empty plates piled on the table. There are not many restaurants in the hotel. The all-day dining restaurant does not serve buffet in the evening. If you want a buffet, you can only go to the sea bottom restaurant. The price of 668 is a bit expensive. The hotel swimming pool is not big, one adult pool, one adult and children pool. All are outdoor swimming pools, no indoor swimming pools. Because there are children at home, they all play in the children‚Äôs pool, but there is a net red glass self-rowing boat for people to experience in the pool, and the boat is often unable to control the boat well, and it is easy to hit people, especially when there are too many people. . Let's talk about room service. The hinge of the toilet lid slipped off when I first checked in. It can be seen that the toilet lid did not turn up at all when cleaning, otherwise it would be impossible to find it. In addition, I need to complain about the most basic sanitation every day. Since the adults and children were tired on the first day, only the waiter was asked to change the towels. But in the next few days, the waiter really only changed the towels, did not do any cleaning, and did not replace the toiletries. It was not until the last night to improve and clean up completely. The hotel did a return visit the night before leaving the store, and I reported all these questions to the hotel. The hotel provided V3 fruit plate and red wine to make up for it, but because it was about to leave the store to catch a flight the next day, there was no tasting. I hope that as an established 5-star InterContinental, I will use more snacks in service management. .

The beach in Bialong Bay is okay, very clean, and there are many choices for breakfast.
Mainly talk about the shortcomings I encountered:
1. I booked a premium sea view room, which is a few hundred larger than the ordinary sea view room. It is on the 15th floor. It is on the left side, but there is no particularly good angle. There is a large construction site on the right side of the hotel. It is huge. Our room is almost straight. To the construction site, if I take a seascape, I need to avoid it in order not to photograph it, and it is the kind that will exist for a few years in a short period of time, and there is no way. Picture one is the construction site I deliberately photographed alone, and picture two is the scenery facing my balcony. The construction site is still very influential and can only be avoided by looking at it from another angle.
2. After reading a lot of good reviews, they said that there is a housekeeper and would add wx, because we just came from Ritz and like this way of communication. As a result, we stayed for three days and two nights, and no one added me. Heap questions are all asked by themselves over the phone. The feeling is really the cold feeling of the big hotel.
3. The hotel‚Äôs sanitation is good. I ordered a double bed and called the waiter to put together a big bed. They put it together professionally. It was not simply smashed together, and it started from the mattress to be layered layer by layer, which was amazing. But we almost played outside the next day. We didn‚Äôt see any cleaning every time we came back. There was no cleaning from 10 o‚Äôclock to 4 o‚Äôclock in the afternoon. We called twice and didn‚Äôt come. The cleaning house was hung up for a day, but no one came. In the end, my husband called again at 6-7 o'clock before coming to clean. This experience is particularly bad. Ritz always cleans at least twice a day, and there is a good night gift.
4. There was welcome fruit on the day of check-in, but there was no more on the next day. I didn‚Äôt add anything. I called to ask for a little bit. The lady on the phone said that it would be delivered soon, but after a minute, I received a call, saying that I was embarrassed and only checked in. Fruits are only available on the same day, and you will need to buy them later. I may not be harmed if there is no comparison. Fruits are all managed in Ritz, and hotels may have their own regulations.
5. The bathtub in the hotel is on the balcony. My baby likes to take a bath very much, but it is definitely not possible to soak in these few days. One is that there is only an outdoor fence, which is a bit dangerous. The other is that the weather is very hot and I can‚Äôt enjoy this thing very well. I believe that most of the bathtubs are left unused, which is really a waste and a pity.
Finally, I hope that these feelings can help you understand the hotel more three-dimensionally.

The only hope that the hotel can upgrade the toilet in the future. If there is a smart toilet, it must be very comfortable. The hotel also comes with a diving pool, and the baby experienced snorkeling, and the price is reasonable. The beach of the hotel is quite big, and there are not many people. Except for the heat, there is nothing wrong with it. Finally, let's talk about the food and beverages. I have experienced various packages in various restaurants. In short, I am not disappointed. In the end, I would like to praise the housekeeper cici. I added cici WeChat when I checked in. If you have any questions on WeChat, you can ask cici to reply in time, so that we can travel without worry.
